item.title: 投资者为财报季做好准备，期权下跌；特斯拉下挫
item.description: 在第三季度财报季拉开帷幕之前，美国股指期货周五走低，此前9月份通胀数据好于预期，巩固了美联储11月份降息25个基点的预期。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged lower on Friday, ahead of the third-quarter earnings season kickoff, after hotter-than-expected September inflation data solidified expectations for a 25-basis-point rate cut by the Federal Reserve in November.】

item.title: 欧盟与中国的电动汽车争端：法国干邑集团准备应对后果
item.description: 在法国西部这个葡萄种植区，白兰地生产商们正为欧盟与中国之间的贸易争端所带来的影响而焦虑不安，而克里斯托夫-布埃塔尔（Christophe Bouetard）比大多数人都更加忧心忡忡。【原文：In this grape-growing region of western France, where brandy producers are fretting over the fallout from a trade dispute between the European Union and China, Christophe Bouetard is more worried than most.】

item.title: 大众汽车第三季度交付量下降，证实欧洲汽车业面临挑战
item.description: 大众汽车集团周五报告称，第三季度全球交付量下降了 7%，显示出欧洲汽车行业面临的挑战程度。【原文：Volkswagen Group reported a 7% decline in third-quarter global deliveries on Friday, showing the extent of challenges faced by the European auto sector.】

item.title: 美国回购活动激增可能加剧资金压力
item.description: 隔夜回购协议的急剧稳步上升使作为美国政府证券短期借款中间人的银行不堪重负，有可能在每季度末和年末加剧重大的资金压力。【原文：A sharp steady rise in overnight repurchase agreements is overwhelming banks that serve as middlemen for such short-term borrowings in U.S. government securities, threatening to fuel major funding pressure at the end of every quarter and year.】

item.title: 空客高管认为波音罢工不会造成影响，但对 CFM 和 Spirit 感到担忧
item.description: 空中客车公司（AIR.PA）飞机制造业务首席执行官周五表示，这家欧洲飞机制造商正在关注波音公司工人罢工的广泛影响，但尚未看到罢工对共享供应商交付的零部件数量产生直接影响。【原文：The CEO of Airbus' AIR.PA planemaking business said on Friday the European planemaker was monitoring the wider impact of a strike by Boeing workers, but had not yet seen a direct impact on the number of parts delivered by shared suppliers.】

item.title: Stellantis 高层调整未能迅速提振士气
item.description: 法国-意大利汽车制造商 Stellantis 周五股价恢复下跌，此前该公司确认首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯将于 2026 年退休，并宣布了其他管理层变动，但这些变动未能提振市场情绪。【原文：Shares in French-Italian automaker Stellantis resumed their decline on Friday after the carmaker confirmed the retirement of CEO Carlos Tavares in 2026 and announced other management changes which failed to lift sentiment.】

item.title: 特斯拉机器人出租车活动承诺多多，但投资者希望了解更多细节
item.description: 对于一个为食言而苦恼的商人来说，马斯克给自己列了一张相当长的待办事项清单。【原文：For a businessman who struggles with broken promises, Musk gave himself quite a to-do list.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士：Northvolt 正在洽谈约 2 亿欧元的融资计划
item.description: 三位熟知内情的消息人士称，Northvolt 正在与投资者和贷款人谈判，以获得约 2 亿欧元（约合 2.18 亿美元）的资金，这家资金短缺的瑞典电池制造商正寻求稳定其短期财务状况。【原文：Northvolt is in talks with investors and lenders to secure about 200 million euros ($218 million) in funding, three sources familiar with the matter said, as the cash-strapped Swedish battery maker seeks to stabilise its short-term finances.】

item.title: 独家报道贝恩寻求为日本 Kioxia 公司估值 100 亿美元，投资者只愿支付一半
item.description: 两位消息人士称，投资者迫使贝恩资本将其为日本 Kioxia 首次公开募股寻求的估值几乎降低了一半，导致这家美国收购公司放弃了这家内存芯片制造商 10 月份上市的计划。【原文：Investors pushed Bain Capital to almost halve the valuation it was seeking for Japan's Kioxia in an IPO, leading the U.S. buyout firm to scrap its plans for an October listing of the memory chipmaker, two sources said.】

item.title: 布雷博以 4.05 亿美元收购悬架制造商 Ohlins Racing
item.description: 意大利布雷博公司周五表示，已同意以 4.05 亿美元的价格收购悬挂技术制造商 Ohlins Racing，这是这家高级制动器制造商有史以来最大的一笔收购。【原文：Italy's Brembo said on Friday it had agreed to buy suspension technology manufacturer Ohlins Racing for $405 million, in the premium brake maker's biggest ever acquisition.】

item.title: 比利时 Ageas 公司与英国 Saga 公司就保险经纪合作进行独家谈判
item.description: 比利时保险公司 Ageas 正在与英国 50 岁以上的度假集团 Saga 进行独家谈判，以建立为期 20 年的汽车和家庭保险经纪合作伙伴关系，两家公司周五表示。【原文：Belgian insurer Ageas is in exclusive talks to set up a 20-year motor and home insurance broking partnership with British over-50s holiday group Saga , the two companies said on Friday.】

item.title: 首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯将于 2026 年退休后，Stellantis 下跌
item.description: 在米兰上市的 Stellantis 公司周五股价下跌约 1%，此前该汽车制造商确认首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯将于 2026 年退休，并宣布了重大的高级管理层变动。【原文：Milan-listed shares in Stellantis slipped around 1% on Friday after the carmaker confirmed the retirement of CEO Carlos Tavares in 2026 and announced major senior management changes.】

item.title: 保时捷九个月在华销量骤降三分之一
item.description: 德国跑车制造商保时捷周五公布，九个月来在中国的销量下降了 29%，与宝马和奔驰一样，在中国的业绩也出现下滑。【原文：German sports car maker Porsche on Friday posted a 29% nine-month sales drop in China, joining peers BMW and Mercedes in reporting weaker results in the country.】

item.title: 如果美国钢铁交易完成，新日铁将向安赛乐米塔尔出售卡尔弗特合资公司
item.description: 新日铁周五表示，如果安赛乐米塔尔对美国钢铁公司的收购竞标成功，新日铁将出售其在阿拉巴马州卡尔弗特合资钢铁厂的全部 50% 股份。【原文：Nippon Steel said on Friday it will sell its entire 50% stake in the joint venture steel plant in Calvert, Alabama, with ArcelorMittal if the top Japanese steelmaker's buyout bid for United States Steel is successful.】

item.title: 塞恩斯伯里最大投资者 QIA 减持股份
item.description: 塞恩斯伯里最大的股东卡塔尔投资局（QIA）正在出售这家英国超市集团价值 3.06 亿英镑（3.99 亿美元）的股份。【原文：The biggest shareholder in Sainsbury's , the Qatar Investment Authority (QIA), is selling 306 million pounds ($399 million) worth of shares in the British supermarket group.】

item.title: 赛诺菲洽谈向 CD&R 出售消费者保健业务 50%的股份
item.description: 法国制药巨头赛诺菲公司周五表示，该公司已与美国私募股权公司 Clayton Dubilier & Rice 就出售其消费保健业务 Opella 50%的控股权进行了讨论。【原文：Sanofi has entered into discussions with U.S. private equity firm Clayton Dubilier & Rice to sell a controlling 50% stake in its consumer health business Opella, the French pharmaceutical giant said on Friday.】

item.title: 中国股市每周资金流入创历史新高，日本股市出现 20 年来最大资金流出 - 巴克莱银行
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）援引 EPFR 的数据称，截至本周三的一周内，新兴市场股票的资金流入量创下历史新高，其中中国股票的资金流入量创下历史新高。【原文：Emerging market stocks saw record inflows in the week to Wednesday, Barclays said citing data from EPFR, led by record inflows into Chinese equities.】

item.title: 日本 9 月通胀放缓，出口增长放缓：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社周五的一项民意调查显示，由于政府补贴导致能源成本下降，日本 9 月份的核心消费通胀率可能有所下降，而出口增长则大幅放缓。【原文：Japan's core consumer inflation rate likely eased in September as energy costs eased due to government subsidies, while export growth slowed sharply, a Reuters poll showed on Friday.】

item.title: 早间竞价：市场在不确定的周末前转向谨慎
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 汉莎航空在意大利的冒险赌注取决于罗马机场的扩建
item.description: 汉莎航空对意大利 ITA 航空公司许诺已久的扭亏为盈，对于帮助这家德国航空公司重振雄风至关重要，这与罗马菲乌米奇诺机场能否实施雄心勃勃的扩建计划息息相关。【原文：Lufthansa's long-promised turnaround of Italy's ITA Airways, crucial to help revive the German airline's fortunes, is interlinked with Rome airport Fiumicino's ability to implement an ambitious expansion plan.】

item.title: 印度食品通胀率居高不下，贫困学童的午餐盒里食物越来越少
item.description: 由于蔬菜、水果和豆类价格上涨，政府资助的学校膳食遭到削减，印度近两年的粮食通胀率不断攀升，贫困儿童的午餐盒里所剩无几。【原文：Nearly two years of elevated food inflation in India is leaving less in the lunch boxes of impoverished children, as government funded school meals suffer cutbacks because of rising prices of vegetables, fruits and pulses.】

item.title: 消息人士称，字节跳动在马来西亚裁员 700 多人，转向人工智能节制
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，中国社交媒体平台 TikTok 的母公司字节跳动已从其马来西亚分公司裁员 700 多人，因为该公司已将重点转向在内容审核中更多地使用人工智能。【原文：China's ByteDance, the parent of social media platform TikTok, has laid off more than 700 workers from its Malaysian unit as the company shifts focus towards greater use of AI in content moderation, two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 波音公司对罢工工会提出不公平劳动行为指控
item.description: 波音公司周四晚些时候表示，已向美国全国劳工关系委员会（National Labor Relations Board）提起对代表约 33,000 名美国西海岸工厂罢工工人的工会的不公平劳动行为指控。【原文：Boeing said late on Thursday it filed an unfair labor practice charge with the National Labor Relations Board against the union that represents about 33,000 striking U.S. West Coast factory workers.】

item.title: 投资者对中东地区可能出现的供应中断保持警惕，但石油价格有所回落
item.description: 周五，石油价格在前一天的反弹后有所回落，但仍将连续第二周上涨，因为投资者权衡了飓风破坏对美国需求的影响，以及以色列袭击伊朗石油基地是否会造成广泛的供应中断。【原文：Oil eased on Friday after a rally the previous day, but prices remained set for a second straight weekly gain as investors weighed the impact of hurricane damage on U.S. demand against any broad supply disruption if Israel attacks Iranian oil sites.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将出现五周来首次下跌，中国刺激政策备受关注
item.description: 随着中国股市的惊人涨势得到喘息，亚洲股市出现了五周以来的首次下跌，尽管所有的目光都集中在本周末中国政府备受期待的财政刺激政策的细节上。【原文：Asian shares were headed for the first weekly loss in five as the stunning rally in Chinese shares took a breather, although all eyes are on the details of the much-anticipated fiscal stimulus from Beijing this weekend.】

item.title: 交易员增加美联储减息押注，美元多头受挫
item.description: 隔夜美元兑主要货币从两个月高点回落，此前劳动力市场疲软的迹象增强了美联储加快降息的理由。【原文：The U.S. dollar fell from two-month highs hit overnight versus its major peers after signs of weakness in the labour market boosted the case for quicker Federal Reserve rate cuts.】

item.title: 经济下滑导致通胀放缓，韩国央行下调利率
item.description: 韩国央行四年半来首次下调政策利率，从抑制目前低于其 2% 目标的通胀转向关注恢复增长。【原文：South Korea's central bank cut policy interest rates for the first time in four and a half years, making a shift away from quashing inflation, currently below its 2% target, to focus on reviving growth.】

item.title: 韩国央行如期下调政策利率
item.description: 由于第二季度总体通胀放缓、经济萎缩，韩国央行周五一如市场普遍预期下调了利率，开始了与全球同行一样的宽松周期。【原文：South Korea's central bank cut interest rates on Friday as widely expected, embarking on an easing cycle to join global peers, as headline inflation slowed and the economy shrank in the second quarter.】

item.title: Citadel 的格里芬说他不支持唐纳德-特朗普竞选总统
item.description: Citadel 首席执行官肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）周四表示，他不支持唐纳德-特朗普在即将举行的美国总统大选中竞选总统。【原文：Citadel CEO Ken Griffin said on Thursday that he has not supported Donald Trump for president in the upcoming U.S. presidential election.】

item.title: 巴菲特的伯克希尔公司将所持美国银行股份降至 10%以下
item.description: 亿万富翁沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）本周抛售了更多的美国银行股票，使其在这家美国银行业巨头的持股比例降至 10%以下。【原文：Billionaire Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway unloaded more Bank of America stock this week that takes its stake in the U.S. banking giant below 10%.】
